topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54417bae636872301c1f0200#post_54417bae636872301c1f0200
It's very fiscally conservative with a fairly neutered executive office and nob intervening congress.
That's really what people care about I think since it only comes up when discussing which states are doing well.
Texas being one of them, for those reasons and the oil.
Similar to how Norway does well (most oil per capita) despite being on the opposite end of the spectrum.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5441a912636872624f190000#post_5441a912636872624f190000
Interesting characters, unique gameplay, cool 3 dimensional stories.
I can totally see ponies ramming each other in battles in a game like this.

[spoiler]After seeing the gameplay, this game would fit well within the context nature of Gamergate.
Everyone trying to find the most suitable way to engage each other. Charging and deflecting attacks. Pulling trump cards.[/spoiler]
